column5: Headed up to the Chapleau area on  6/19.  Been many times.  How are the black flies?  I mean, are we talking bug spray or head nets?
in Wawa right now...its more like aerial spray (fog em)

Not many warm days to get rid of em yet, eh?  I've been keeping an eye on the weather, seem to be kind of a late warm up.  Will be up your way a week from tomorrow.  Staying at White Fang on our way up.
Just returned they are bad and looking to get meaner

i was up at aubery may long weekend and even with the cold weather there was a few out. in the bush around the sault area the skeeters are going NUTS, you will get eaten alive and im sure chapleau is the same, although i have not seen a single black fly all skeeters and those little sand flies i believe they are called. i'd be bringing a net, spray, those lights, everything that will help bring it!!
